title: 1 Chance 2 Dance
description: When an aspiring dancer is uprooted during her senior year of high school, she finds herself torn between two boys -- and with one shot at her dream.
actors: Lexi Giovagnoli, Justin Ray, Rae Latt, Poonam Basu

title: 1 Mile to You
description: After escaping the bus accident that killed his girlfriend, a high school student channels his grief into running, with the help of a new coach.
actors: Billy Crudup, Graham Rogers, Liana Liberato, Stefanie Scott

title: 1 Night
description: Over the course of one night, two teens with a shared history reconnect despite social differences, while a couple in their 30s debates their future.
actors: Anna Camp, Justin Chatwin, Isabelle Fuhrman, Kyle Allen

title: 10 jours en or
description: When a carefree bachelor is unexpectedly left in charge of a young boy, the two embark on a road trip that will change both of their lives.
actors: Franck Dubosc, Claude Rich, Marie Kremer, Mathis Touré

title: 10,000 B.C.
description: Fierce mammoth hunter D'Leh sets out on an impossible journey to rescue the woman he loves from a vicious warlord and save the people of his village.
actors: Steven Strait, Camilla Belle, Cliff Curtis, Joel Virgel

title: 100 Days of Solitude
description: Spanish photographer José Díaz spends 100 days living alone on a remote mountain, connecting to nature and documenting the beauty of his surroundings.

title: 100 Men
description: A documentarian looks back on his 100 sexual partners -- and reconnects with many -- while musing about society's evolution on gay rights.

title: 100 Meters
description: A man who is diagnosed with multiple sclerosis responds by training for an Ironman triathlon, with his cranky father-in-law's help.
actors: Dani Rovira, Karra Elejalde, Alexandra Jiménez, David Verdaguer

title: 1000 Rupee Note
description: After randomly receiving a handsome political bribe, a sweet, poor elderly woman decides to treat herself a shopping spree, which doesn't go smoothly.
actors: Usha Naik, Sandeep Pathak, Shrikant Yadav, Ganesh Yadav

title: 101 Dalmatians
description: When Cruella De Vil dognaps 15 Dalmatian puppies to make them into a fur coat, their parents rally all the city's animals to come to their rescue.
actors: Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Joan Plowright

description: In Moscow, 12 jurors, representing a cross-section of modern Russia's fractured society, weigh the fate of a teen accused of murdering his stepfather.
actors: Sergei Makovetsky, Nikita Mikhalkov, Sergey Garmash, Valentin Gaft

title: 13 Cameras
description: Young parents-to-be Claire and Ryan move into a suburban rental home, unaware that someone is secretly watching their every move via hidden cameras.
actors: PJ McCabe, Brianne Moncrief, Neville Archambault, Sarah Baldwin

title: 13 Demons
description: A group of gamers discover a banned board game called "13 Demons" with a dark history that's linked to a number of mysterious deaths.
actors: Stephen Grey, Michael Cunningham, Daniel Falicki, Steven Taber

title: 13TH: A Conversation with Oprah Winfrey & Ava DuVernay
description: Oprah Winfrey sits down with director Ava DuVernay to discuss her Oscar-nominated film, historical cycles of oppression and the broken prison system.

title: 14 Cameras
description: Upping the “13 Cameras” ante, this sequel finds a family renting a vacation house that’s been customized to violate their privacy.
actors: Neville Archambault, Amber Midthunder, Brytnee Ratledge, Hank Rogerson

title: 1898: Our Last Men in the Philippines
description: While Spain relinquishes its last colonies, a battle-fatigued outpost engages in a long, brutal and sometimes bizarre clash with Filipino insurgents.
actors: Luis Tosar, Javier Gutiérrez, Álvaro Cervantes, Karra Elejalde

description: An architect and his wife move into a castle that is slated to become a luxury hotel. But something inside is determined to stop the renovation.
actors: Rajneesh Duggal, Adah Sharma, Indraneil Sengupta, Anjori Alagh

title: 1920 London
description: When her wealthy husband is bedeviled by a mysterious locket, a desperate woman turns to her forbidden former lover, an expert of the occult.
actors: Sharman Joshi, Meera Chopra, Vishal Karwal, Meenal Kapoor
